SEARCH
Package polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
polimi.ingsw.view.flow.UI
polimi.ingsw.view.gui.GUI
public class GUI extends UI
GUI class. This class is the GUI implementation of the UI abstract class and it manages all the GUI-related operations.
